name: Kingdom Crusade
overview: Thy quest, brave hero, is of utmost urgency. The fate of the kingdom rests in thine hands, as thou must conquer or be conquered by thine enemy by taking over the enemy army and enemy fortresses. Use thine army wisely, for though thou hast thine own legion of wizards, giants, paladins and knights, the enemy army is similarly equipped and will be fighting a crusade of their own. Good luck in your quest crusader and may Merlin's mystic brow guide you on your way.
